description: Began formal Jyotish training under traditional teachers in Chennai.
Started private consultations focused on career and relationship guidance.
Expanded into structured teaching for beginner and intermediate students.
Launched mentorship format for practitioners and consultation ethics.
Pricing note from brochure: fees are structured for existing Astrofoxx students; outside/foreign students add 35%. Offer pricing is applicable up to 14 January 2026 and may be revised.
